body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting XYZ Car Dealership customer service. This is Nicholas Jones speaking. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Nicholas, my name is Joyce Rogers.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joyce! Could you please provide me with your phone number, separating it into individual digits?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, nine zero eight seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joyce. And can you also share with me your email address, letter by letter?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's j, o, y, c, e, dot, r, o, g, e, r, s, at, gmail, dot, com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Joyce. Is there anything else you'd like to share or ask about today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that's it for now, Nicholas. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Joyce. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a wonderful day!
